John Richardson

Height 6-1

Class Junior

Hometown London, England

Highschool St. Paul's School (London)

Bio

Related

Historical

Biography

2023-24:

In the lineup for all four fall tournaments

11 tournament rounds, 74.7 stroke average

Low round 71, -1 (1st round at Hamptonsl Intercollegiate)

FALL

*Tied as low Penn player, t-35th overall at Georgetown Intercollegiate (75-75-81—231, +15)

*Low Penn player, t-16th overall at Loyola’s Hamptons Intercollegiate (71-74-72—217, +1)

*t-2nd among Penn players, t-18th overall at the Temple Invitational (71-75—146, +6)

*4th among Penn players, t-38th overall at Colgate’s Alex Lagowitz Memorial (77-76-75—228, +12)

2022-23:

Second-team All-Ivy (t-10th at Ivy League Championships)

In the lineup for all ten tournaments

Tied for team high with 25 tournament rounds, 74.4 stroke average

Low round 69, -2 (1st round at Golden Horseshoe/2nd round at Ryan T. Lee Memorial Intercollegiate)

GCAA All-America Scholar

SPRING

*Tied as low Penn player, t-10th overall at Ivy League Championships (77-75-73—225, +9)

*3rd among Penn players, t-20th overall at Columbia’s Roar-EE Invitational (72, E)

*3rd among Penn players, t-34th overall at Princeton Invitational (71-70-76—217, +4)

*4th among Penn players, t-36th overall at Columbia Spring Invitational (75-74—149, +9)

*3rd among Penn players, t-35th overall at W&M’s Golden Horseshoe Intercollegiate (69-71-83—223, +10)

FALL

*t-2nd among Penn players, t-49th overall at Loyola’s Hamptons Intercollegiate (78-79-87—244, +28)

*t-4th among Penn players, t-50th overall at Yale’s Macdonald Cup (76-77-70—223, +13)

*Tied as low Penn player (A), t-12th overall at Cornell/Temple Invitational (71-72—143, +3)

*2nd among Penn players (A), t-18th overall at Fairfield’s Ryan T. Lee Memorial (71-69—140, -2)

*2nd among Penn players, t-42nd overall at Colgate’s Alex Lagowitz Memorial (71-78-74—223, +7)

2021-22:

In the lineup for five tournaments, B lineup for two others (one fall, one spring)

18 tournament rounds, second on the team with 75.9 stroke average

Low round 68 (2nd round at Bash at the Beach)

SPRING

*3rd among Penn players, t-16th overall at Ivy League Championships (74-80-73—227, +14)

*2nd among Penn players, t-28th overall at Yale Spring Invitational (75-73—148, +8)

*2nd among Penn players, t-46th overall at Princeton Invitational (73-77-72—222, +9)

*2nd among Penn players (A), t-50th overall at W&M’s Golden Horseshoe Intercollegiate (77-88-72—237, +24)

*3rd among Penn players (B), t-52nd overall at App State’s Bash at the Beach (74-68-75—217, +4)

FALL

*Tied as low Penn player (B), t-40th overall at Cornell Invitational (73-78—151, +9)

*t-4th among Penn players (A), t-83rd overall at Ryan T. Lee Memorial Collegiate (84-81—165, +21)

High School: Five-year letter winner in golf, three-year captain … Qualified twice for the Independent Schools Golf Association (ISGA) National Finals, finishing 10th in 2017 and 14th in 2018 … Surrey Golf Club member from U12 to U18 level, playing for Surrey’s First Team and serving as captain at the U14 and U16 levels … Selected for the 2018 and 2019 Friendship Trophy as well as international matches vs. Wales in 2016 and 2017 … England South Regional Squad member from 2016-18 … One of four boys to represent England in an international match vs. Spain in 2018 in Madrid, serving as team captain and winning three of his four matches … Reached the match-play stage of the 2019 R&A Boys’ Amateur Championship … Emerged from a three-way playoff to win the Faldo Series England Midlands U18 championship in 2019 … Runner-up at the 2017 and 2018 Surrey U18 Boys Championship … Won the 2019 South Eastern County League with Surrey U18s, winning his matches 5&3 and 1-up … Also played one year of rugby, earning his Sporting Colours in 2016 … POLECON Society member … Viera Gray Care Home volunteer.

Personal: Son of Andrea and Neil Richardson … Enrolled in the College of Arts and Sciences.
